website_summaries.verdict: Busy moms praise this bra for its multi-tasking design. However, it's worth noting that it can be a hassle to get the bra on.
pros: Unlike its competitors, this nursing bra comes with a hands-free breast pump
The design allows tired new moms a chance to relax or multi-task during feedings
cons: While this bra is convenient once it's on, several moms gripe that it can take a lot of time and effort to get the bra on

customer_reviews.title: BUY THE INSERT
customer_reviews.text: Great fit WITH THE INSERT. Otherwise, the nipple cut outs are oddly close together. I am a very average build, so I didn't order the insert at first. Mistake. Then had to pay shipping and wait for it to arrive before I could really test out the bra. Supports full bottles well. It literally is hands free. I pump at my desk throughout the day, and this is sooo much easier than holding and balancing bottles while trying to do other things. I do not find this bra comfortable enough to wear as a regular bra - I simply keep it with my pumping supplies and slip it on for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: LRD81

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend this bra
customer_reviews.text: I was very encouraged by positive reviews but the product ended up being horrible. I've only used the bra for less than a month but the seams on the back came undone exposing a very harsh Velcro type material that scratches my skin and leaves snags on my professional tops! The bra is also very bulky since it's designed to fit a whole range of sizes. The adjustable Velcro bar on the back drive me crazy because it kept getting undone. After a month of use the bra is no longer usable. Will not recommend this bra.
customer_reviews.author: Ksenia

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and have used it once. I'm currently around a 38D for reference. Definitely worth the money. I like that it zips in the front so I don't have to fasten it and twist it around or anything like that. Its staying up as a strapless, but comes with straps if you want to use them. My only issue is that I need to figure out a better way to get the suction funnel things in and out easier. The bra does a great job holding them in, I'm pretty sure it's just me needing to figure out how to work it.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for pumping moms!
customer_reviews.text: I'm only upset in the photo because I couldn't find a place to pump in a hospital other than the bathroom... But anyway, I love this bra and use it 3-times a day during the work week. I only wear it for the 15-20 minutes it takes to pump, usually over my clothes and without straps because I'm pretty lazy. It's soft and comfortable and I haven't had any issues with the seams or velcro wearing out and I've been pumping for almost 5 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Good but needed a center panel
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, however, for me, and it seems many others, the center panel is necessary to purchase in order for the product to properly align to allow you to pump. The center panel is only sold on the Simple Wishes website and with a code, you only need to pay shipping, which is not expensive. I paid $2.15 total for the item. In the future, I would hope to see Simple Wishes automatically selling the product WITH the center panel, or expanding the width to fit normal nipples. In addition, if the center panel was sold on Amazon, it would alleviate the additional search and purchase from another site.
customer_reviews.author: NA Costa

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate size chart. Too short for large chests.
customer_reviews.text: Despite being within the size chart, this is too small. The band size (width) is fine. Plenty of room there. But it’s too short for a large chested woman. They say it goes up to J cup but that’s impossible considering how short the bra is. My boobs were coming out the bottom of the bra no matter how I adjusted them. I guess I’m giving up on finding a hands free pumping bra that will ACTUALLY fit a larger chest.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Robinette

customer_reviews.title: Works with Avent electric double breast pump.
customer_reviews.text: If you have the Philips Avent breast pump you know that the flame does do not come off which makes it very unfortunate for buying accessories the flange openings here are large enough you can fit the Phillips avent breast pump. That was my main reason for buying this I saw a Netflix show called working moms that had a woman using this bra with her avent pump. Glad I bought it. I am a 36 D 5'1 & 155 lbs the xS-LG worked good for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but short lived...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly a must have for any mom using a breast pump. It is a godsend. I have 3 of these bras, I get exclusively pump because my baby is unable to swallow, so they are well used. I absolutely adore being able to pump hands-free. I like to multitask and these work perfectly for my lifestyle! The reason for my review is my newest bra is falling apart after 3 months of use. It has a giant tear across the bottom front and small holes on another seam. Great product, but it lasted less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: J. Olmstead

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Spectra 2 Flanges
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to hold the Spectra S2 Plus flanges to me so I didn't have to hold them. I was not looking for a bra to wear all day. So this fits my need perfectly. I like that you can adjust the size of the band (to ensure a snug fit and to fit many sized women). I zip it on, pop the flanges in, hook up the tubes and away I go. I was a bit confused on sizing when purchasing the bra, but this bra should fit the average woman. I've only had the bra for a month so not sure if the bra (that holds the flanges) will stretch out/misshapen over time.
customer_reviews.author: Luice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, adjustable, hands free pumping bra
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hands free pumping bra. In fact I'm writing this review while pumping with the bra on right now! First, as you can see in the pictures I'm including it's easily adjustable using Velcro so that it is truly one size fits all and can change size as your breasts change. Also, it is very easy to put the bra on and attach the pump. So you are not wasting precious time hooking everything up. Finally, it comes with optional straps in case you need more support. I could not ask for more from a pumping bra. Pros: One size fits all Easily adjustable Easy to take in and off Easy to attach pump Cons: No
customer_reviews.author: Sassy homemaker

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have for multitasking mommas
customer_reviews.text: If you are going to pump at work, this is a must. I have two; one for home and one for the office. I have washed it multiple times and it has kept it's shape and elasticity. I've noticed a little more give in the band the longer I use it but that's an easy fix (adjustable band). The fabric in cups has stayed tight and still holds the breastshields in place. It makes pumping less of a chore and helps maintain productivity at work. Honestly if I didn't have it, I am not sure that I would have continued to breastfeed after I returned to work.
customer_reviews.author: KGoldie

customer_reviews.title: Works well with Spectra parts
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I needed a hands free bra that fit my Spectra parts and this bra has not disappointed. The elasticity allows you to control the fit. Some people complain about the it being to weak, but I think it’s just right. I haven’t washed it yet, but it seems like it’ll hold up. The pink shade is nice. I love the convenience of being able to wrap this around whatever I happen to be wearing. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: bacolb

customer_reviews.title: Not the Lansinoh- buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the same as the Lansinoh simple wishes. Don’t waste your money. Because of the name on the page I thought that is what I was getting, not so. I am very disappointed in this purchase. The material is stiff and the pump openings are cut weird/ too small so when you put it on your nipple pokes out, which is painful until you get the pump phalange attached. The zipper has plastic pieces at the top and bottom that are very sharp and will scratch you if you’re not careful, and poke you when you bend/ turn while wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: RCG2016

customer_reviews.title: Great for small frames or those needing to adjust sizes regularly
customer_reviews.text: This is the laniosh bra. I bought this because it’s adjustable to fit my small frame (98lbs). I don’t use the zipper function In the front because I find it too cumbersome and time consuming to hold my shields in place and zip up with my nursing cover on (I pump at work and need to be fast) instead I keep the front zipped and use the Velcro function in the back because it’s much faster and I can have the shields in place already. That said, the Velcro does seem to wear out after repeated removal. I pump 3-4 times a day and each bra lasts about 5-6 months using it this way
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday. It's made my life so much easier. I don't have time to sit and pump, so I wear this is the morning while I'm getting ready...I do my hair and makeup while pumping. I also use this to pump at work...I am able to talk on the phone, and document calls while pumping, thanks to this bra. This is the second one of these that I have owned. The first lasted over a year of daily use, and then the velcro became separated. I was a size 36c prior to nursing, and am significantly larger now, and the one size fits great. Its adjustable, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kar Star

customer_reviews.title: Shedding fiber into your pumped milk. Unsafe!
customer_reviews.text: Potential hazard to your little ones! Using spectra pump, found traces of black fiber IN THE PUMPED MILK! Enough said, you might be feeding your LO not only contaminated milk but also cloth fiber right into the stomach. Not sure how is this possible, but see the pic for yourself. If you got the pink ones you may not even realize this... This alone makes it unnecessary to mention the bad design that offers poor comfort, as the hard nylon zipper digs right into skin.
customer_reviews.author: sheenapunk

customer_reviews.title: Will make your life easier
customer_reviews.text: I got this to pump for work and thus far it has made a world of a difference. Not only am I able to pump hands free but it also cuts my pumping time in half. As I return to work I know my pumping sessions will allow me to get some notes done since I will be able to do both. Nursing takes a lot of time and energy so why not make it a bit easier. Thank you to whoever invented this bra. I bought a size small and I am a size 34 C, it does stretch over time with each use but it is still totally useable.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Big Boobs Need Not Apply
customer_reviews.text: Big breasted women keep shopping. The "cups" are flat, soft fabric resembling an A/B cup flattening sports bra, with all the depth of a trainer bra, giving the breasts zero support, becoming patently painful as the filling bottles, with their increasing weight, are entirely held to the breast by pump suction. Sure, the band is completely adjustable, so girth is not an issue, but the shoelace thin straps dig deeply into traps while doing offering no more support than needed to keep the top of the "bra" up. Ultimately, a similar result could be achieved by laying down and flattening breasts with ace bandages with more support and less pain caused by downward pulling on tissue.
customer_reviews.author: Anon E Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and love love love it!! I was actually looking for something cheaper but chose this one due to the options for no straps and a zipper (great for pumping at work). This this is amazing. Game changer for sure. It fits great. I was a little worried because I am on the smaller side, but it actually can go a lot smaller or larger. It fits great. The shields fit snug and pumping is a breeze. I should have purchased this two weeks ago. Some reviews mention a converter. I didn’t need one- it fit great. Worth the cost for sure.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna Jones Kaul

customer_reviews.title: Great for varying sizes!
customer_reviews.text: Searched amazon for one of these after seeing the hefty price tag the pump supplier was attaching for this addition. I’m pretty certain it’s actually the same one at a $20 savings buying through amazon instead. Great fit! I was worried about this sizing due to my small band/ large cup dilemma and it fits perfectly. I love that you can quickly and easily adjust the band with the secure Velcro. Almost passed this up due to the antiquated photo depictions of the handsfree pump life though !
customer_reviews.author: Dawnsicle

customer_reviews.title: Not great for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This bra is ok if you will be sitting at home all day for pumping only. The zip in the front is awkward to have totally open when only nursing on one side. The velcro in the back is difficult to adjust to get the right fit. The material in the front to hold in the pump is noticeable through most shirts so, not great for wearing out. Since there isn't separate cups, my nursing pads would often move around and wouldn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: jlw1120

customer_reviews.title: Apprehensive but love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive of all the positive reviews: how can the material hold the pump parts on?! Well it does, and it does so very well! This is a must if you need to work and pump (or just have use of your hands at all). The velcro is strong and the sizing is extremely customizable for a good fit, from the wrap tightness on your torso, to the optional straps. I love it. I purchased two and use one while the other is in the hamper/laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel P.

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: What a game changer ! I’m a new mom and my baby is 6 days old , he hasn’t been latching on so I’ve been pumping and holding the pumps was getting very tiring , at one point I nodded off and spilt my precious milk! I new something had to change and this bra was it! I’m even using it right now as I wrote this review ! I didn’t think it would work I thought it wouldn’t hold the pumps in place but it does and it has plenty of support. This is a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Best hands-free breastpump bra ever
customer_reviews.text: It makes life so easy! I've tried other brands and none of them offer the same support this one does. If you pump at work, or like to multi-task (as much as you can), or simply don't want to worry about the bottles while you're pumping, this is a MUST have item. Note: I'm very fortunate to have tons of milk, and my bottles were always 2/3 to completely full, so these were the only bras that could handle the weight without giving out. Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Acbunker

customer_reviews.title: Hands free is the way to be! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am pumping as I type this. Absolutely love this bra. For the past 2 days my milk supply has decreased and my let down has taken much longer. Within minutes of using my milk started to come in and I have about 5oz of milk already. Oh yeah it’s comfortable, adjustable straps(multiple uses), Velcro back. No complaints. Purchased the xs-l size. 34DD. The flanges fit perfectly in the slots. I’m hands free and loving it. I don’t feel the need to keep adjusting or even checking to see what’s going on down there lol. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danisha

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I am exclusively pumping and was devastated when I left my hands-free pumping bra in another state. I tried to reorder the one I had, but it was unavailable so I ended up with this one base on reviews. The reviews did not disappoint, this bra is amazing! I love the material and style. I’ve only worn it strapless and at home so far, but it has been great for my middle-of-the-night pumping sessions. So glad I got this bra! And it arrived super fast too!
customer_reviews.author: k_han

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and you don’t have to go out to but a bunch of new bras! I had to exclusively pump the first few weeks and this made things way easier! Super soft and comfortable. They only reason I gave a 4 is because it runs small. I wear a medium and this barely fits and in the furthest extension
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Sussman

customer_reviews.title: Not very useful
customer_reviews.text: It was not comfortable at all. Not something that you could wear for the day under your clothes. Also, it held the pumps in place but not as tightly to me as I would have liked. I got half the amount out of a session than I normally would probably because No pressure against my breasts. I got it so I could be hands-free while using it but it’s so awkward there’s really not much you can do with your hands anyway ha ha
customer_reviews.author: Misss Kayyyte

customer_reviews.title: excellent pumping bra
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this purchase because it seemed to be a "one size fits all" model, but it really works! Great hands-free pumping bra- holds flanges in place and is comfortable. I had not issues with fit. The whole bra is adjustable in multiple ways. I like that you can decide which way you want the zipper to go. Even if you're busty, there is no need for the straps. I personally keep them attached so I can put it on more quickly (I know which way is up) when I am pumping and tired.
customer_reviews.author: Liz F.

customer_reviews.title: Stitching falls apart leaving a sharp edge that scratches.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the fact that the stitching came out. It’s between the plastic hook and Pyle attachment and the fabric so I can’t simply see it back on. And it scratches my back every time I have to use it. I need to double pump and I can’t believe I wasted my time and money on such a piece of junk! I bought it but did not need to use it until December when I began pumping at work, so it was too late to return it. It only stayed together for approximately a week before it began coming apart. Go with another brand that doesn’t fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Bandycat

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Loved it for the first week. Although it does get uncomfortable to leave on, I am exclusively pumping so it was a pain to put on and take off each time I pumped. The back where the Velcro is tends to twist and bunch and comes undone once in a while during pumping sessions. Frustrating. Have used it for about a week and went to go unzip it after was done and the zipper got stuck and now is not able to be used. I liked it in the beginning but now I wish I would have saved my money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S.

customer_reviews.title: Not made like they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this brand of bra's with my first child three years ago. I had used the same two for that whole first year of nursing/pumping. They held up great. I had my second child and thought it was time to replace the bras. So I purchased a couple more bras. Which have not held up at all. The zipper pulls have broken off on one and the Velcro on the backs is coming off on all of them. It is scratching me and also snagging all my work tops. Not happy at all with the quality and have gone back to using my old set.
customer_reviews.author: Wings Fan

customer_reviews.title: Heaven!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot fully express how happy I'm with this bra!!!! It's heaven for a pumping momma. Hold the shield and bottle perfectly and does not lose its elasticity. It's such a relief having one of these, I was so tired of having to hold the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and supportive bra for this exclusive pumper
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product and it definitely works for hands free pumping. I liked the fit and feel of the bra and it’s probably my most comfortable and supportive pumping bra I have bought. Only small issue I have is that my flanges tend to get caught in the opening so you have to really position them the right way to make sure you can get the best suction but other than that I really liked the bra. I’m also an exclusive pumper so I liked that the quality of the bra was great so it can withstand the hours of use I put in each day to pump.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have item
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever invented!!! I wanna purchase more so I can roatate them even more then I do.. but idk about all u other moms. I fall asleep sometimes pumping and before I’d drop the flanges and milk would go everywhere. Or I wasn’t holding them right cause I’d start drifting off. This bra made it so I could grab couple extra good mins of sleep. As a single mom is worth every penny! Adjusts really well for everyone’s size. Comes with straps as well. U don’t habe to use em I only use the one. I put like halter around my back of my neck .
customer_reviews.author: littledff

customer_reviews.title: every day use
customer_reviews.text: I use this pumping bra everyday, twice a day at work and I love it. It holds things in place so I can get work done while pumping. I keep it tight to help squeeze out every last drop of liquid gold. I love it so much, that I bought one for my sister who exclusively pumps. I'm not sure I would like this to nurse in though. And I definitely would not wear it throughout the day, when not pumping. It goes on easy, comes off easy, rolls up and hangs out in the drawer until next pumping session. It does exactly what I want it to!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited about this product. I was a little weary about what size to get so I bought based on the size chart and I got a S/L, which was a good choice! I am 5/10 190pd with 36DD, it fits comfortably. It was easy to use with my Ameda pump and I like that you can adjust it to make is bigger or smaller and it also comes with straps. I don't know why I did not buy this sooner, now I can pump while doing other things instead of just sitting holding the suction pump.
customer_reviews.author: Tomeka Turner

customer_reviews.title: Good compression for use at work
customer_reviews.text: I keep this strapless bra in my pump bag. I only use this bra at work since I need a pump and nurse style for home. Meets my needs for pumping at work, although it is annoying to get undressed every time I have to use it. I can wear nursing tanks and bras and put this over it and even with the bulk of clothes this still offers plenty of compression to keep my pump working well.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Makes pumping easier
customer_reviews.text: As moms who pump know, it can be annoying. My baby is premature so I’ve been pumping since her birth. I ordered this to be waiting for me at home because the first few days, I would have to hold all the pump apparatus by hand which got old very fast. It has been one month since I purchased this item. It does it’s job and washes well. I’m actually pumping as I write this review ;) There are other pricier options for sale but I don’t see why anyone would want to spend more when this does the job just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Misbah Patel

customer_reviews.title: A must buy if you are pumping!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I could not say good enough things about this bra! I am exclusively pumping right now for my baby, and this bra is just so amazing! First of all, if you plan on pumping, having a bra like this is a MUST!! The bra holds everything in place and your hands are completely free. Also, this bra could basically fit anyone because it has velcro in the back to adjust the size around. I loved that feature!! Love love love this bra! Fit is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Best one out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hands free pumping bra. I have tried soooo mamy others. The support is excellent, as you can adjust the band depending on the day/size/feel of your bust. We all know the pumping journey is not the same everyday and being able to adjust the size of the band while NOT sacrificing the support is key! Plus, it is a zipper in the front so way easier to put on at 2am. As well as the nipple holes holding the pump very well (I pump in different positions and it hols extremely well). Worth the money for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Eric D Von Hess

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Being a mother who exclusively pump fed her first son without knowing things like this existed was a major flaw on my part. Purchasing this bra after having my second child has been a huge game changer! It is comfortable, adjusts easily, and holds my flanges in correctly without spilling/leaking milk. I can pump a bottle while feeding my son in his boppy pillow. I can pump and multi task. For a mom who didn't love breast feeding, but still wants her child to receive breastmilk-I highly recommend this bra! Worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: NJJeppers

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for pumping
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my must have for pumping! I used it on and off before going back to work and now I use it twice a day Monday through friday. It's held up really nicely for over a month of back to work now. Comfortable and great fitting (you can adjust using velcro so it's perfect fit.) I wouldnt wear it all day personally because it sort of bulges in the front but its comfortable enough that you could if that didnt bother you.
customer_reviews.author: Cecily TempletonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for pumping moms!
customer_reviews.text: This bra works perfectly for me. I have a Medela pump and the flanges fit well and stay tightly in place the entire time I pump. It was a complete game changer and must-have for me while I pumped late at night and every two hours to get my supply up early on - I needed to be able to have my hands free so I could eat, drink, etc. while pumping. I am a 34D and was confused on how this bra could fit such a wide range of sizes, but the Velcro in back adjusts a ton so I could make it just right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous when ordering this due to the size range of xs-l for one fit. I am a 38D and was scared this wouldn't fit right. It fits great though. The back is velcro and super adjustable. You can move it by several inches, which is really handy. The front makes it easy to fit the flanges through, and it doesn't expose your chest. The only part of you that can be seen in the part in the tubeif the flange. This bra is comfortable and being hands free is amazing. Previously I felt really tied down when pumping. This makes pumping way easier!
customer_reviews.author: Grassshopper021

customer_reviews.title: Must have when pumping!
customer_reviews.text: I had already bought a bunch of nursing bras before our baby arrived and didn't realize how they did not help with pumping. This bra saved me money because I didn't have to go out and buy several pumping bras. I am able to wear the bras I previously bought that unclip and then put this one on top to hold the bottles for pumping. I am a 36dd and bought a size large plus. Fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle W

customer_reviews.title: Bra looks used, dusty and scuffed up
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this pumping bra. I'm due to give birth in a month, and I bought this to make pumping easier. When I took the bra out of the bag though it looked like it had been used, or dragged on a dusty floor. Scuffed up around the seams and openings for the flanges. Extremely disappointed...this bra had great reviews and I was really looking forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Strekowski

customer_reviews.title: Must for breastfeeding moms
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 5 years ago when I had my older one and used it extensively to pump at work. I’m on my second one and still use it. What a life saver. It keeps your hands free and holds the breast shield securely. I’ve used it with multiple sizes of Medela breast shields and am currently using it with a Spectra breast shield. The opening allows you to slide a breast shield in rather easily but also provides almost complete privacy. This is a must have if you have any plans of pumping milk.
customer_reviews.author: Krina

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not great
customer_reviews.text: With my spectra pump this bra seems to make the flange pinch my breast in places and with my Medela or Bellababy pumps it doesn’t hold the flashes close enough to get a good suction/seal. It’s also a little difficult to put on- even with the zipper in front- but I do have large breasts (34 H). Now I will say that one size DOES fit all for this which is its saving grace.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but would be perfect with a couple of improvements
customer_reviews.text: If you're going to pump, this is a must-have item. It sizes up/down really well/easily. I'm not even sure I should have taken a star off, but it isn't very comfortable, and I'd like to have had a way to wear it under clothes to work or the store and not have to take it on and off every time I pump. It doesn't really offer that option since your nips pop out and it isn't smooth in the front.
customer_reviews.author: aubieangel

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a lifesaver. Got one as a baby shower gift then ordered 2 more. I can’t imagine not having one of these. It frees up your hands to cuddle and burp your baby or do things on your phone or eat or whatever. Gives you extra 15-20 min of your life back while you pump. It does stretch out some and leak slightly underneath sometimes. I do wash it every day tough so maybe that’s why. Also, it’s adjustable so you can make it tighter if you need to, which would stop the leaking, it just hasn’t bothered me much to do that yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kat55

customer_reviews.title: There's a Reason That Model Looks D-Lited
customer_reviews.text: Look at all the things she can do with her hands now that she's not holding her pump bottles! Listen, pumping sucks enough already. I don't like feeling like I'm wearing a jetpack when I'm pumping. I'd much rather use this bra to go hands-free, so I can scroll through reddit and try not to fall asleep. It's a good bra! I bought 2. :)
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing for hands free pumping!
customer_reviews.text: Hands free pumping? Yes please! This accessory is one of the best purchases I've made in the entire process of pumping. The sizing for this is adjustable although I would say if your bra cup is over a DDD it might be a tight fit. I was a 34DDD before pregnancy and while the girls have gotten bigger, this band still fits perfectly around but only if I Velcro it to the ends. Other than that, it serves it's purpose and allows me to be hands free without worrying about the pumps falling off the suction. I would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: GKL&GQMJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks ridiculous but works great!!
customer_reviews.text: First time mom here. This bra showed up in my amazon recommendations throughout my pregnancy. I remember laughing because it does look ridiculous and wondering why the girl in the photo looks so happy to be wearing something ridiculous. Fast forward to 3 weeks post partum — I know exactly why this girl is so happy — it’s because this bra is great! adjustable so it fits well, can pump 2x as much and I can multi task. I definitely feel ridiculous wearing if, but benefits outweigh the costs— definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Good Bra
customer_reviews.text: This bra is very helpful. If you're on the bigger end of the size chart, I would size up. Im a 38 D normally, and I ordered the xs-l. It fits but is tight when I'm engorged, and leave it half way unzipped so milk will flow. Otherwise, I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharayah K

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Dealing with a colicky newborn, multitasking is extremely hard. After struggling to get everything done while pumping, I had to find solution to save some time. I was always confused to what this item was for but I had to give it a try even if I end up wasting my money. I’m glad I got this because this product is amazing! Now I can get one more thing done while pumping.
customer_reviews.author: Heta

customer_reviews.title: Saved my Exclusive Pumping Journey
customer_reviews.text: Only two weeks into my exclusive pumping journey and I was considering either weaning or buying a 400$ hands free pump. Even though I still have to cart my actual pump motor around, this bra means I’m able to actually do things with my hands while pumping every two hours like HOLD my baby, or WORK ( I work from home ). I consider myself to be wide set and this bra fit perfectly I did not need the extra insert. Consider trying first before buying the additional insert.
customer_reviews.author: Rollo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust sizing
customer_reviews.text: So much better than I expected. I’m 36G, sometimes 36H, and this provides enough support and holds my flanges in place while pumping. I was concerned that it wouldn’t fit but the Velcro in the back makes it so easy to adjust and there’s plenty of extra fabric to make it as big or as small as you need without it being uncomfortable. It’s a perfect design for needing to adjust it to a changing body size. I don’t wear it all the time but just put it on while pumping. It’s so nice to be able to use my hands to do other things while pumping!
customer_reviews.author: CE

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, not right for me.
customer_reviews.text: I would say, if you are closer to a DDD that this may not work for you. While I could get it on, it really squished the ladies together and would not have worked for me pumping. That was with it adjusted as large as I could get it. With that said, I did have to return it, but I wish it had fit because the quality was excellent and I think it would have worked nicely if it had fit better. Someone will a smaller bust would definitely love this.
customer_reviews.author: Kalynn0789

customer_reviews.title: Great hands free pumping
customer_reviews.text: I like that the band width is highly adjustable. It is simple to use while pumping and it keeps everything secure so there is no leakage. I ordered a second one! I don't use it as a daily wear bra. I only put it on over my regular bra to pump. I don't think I would like to wear it all day because I am large chested and it doesn't have an underwire, but it would make pumping sessions quicker. Like everything breastfeeding/pumping it is expensive IMO, but a typical price for the good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So helpful!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing ever! I was pumping while my baby was in the NICU and this gave me my hands back! So helpful. The larger size fit great - I’m an 18-20 top and it fit well even when I was super engorged. Once my milk came in and my breasts reduced size a bit, I was able to tighten it up to make it smaller. One of the NICU nurses recommended this to me (she uses it to pump in her car on her way to work) and I’m so thankful!
customer_reviews.author: Cedras Clan

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the Medela!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pumping bra! I love that it has removable straps and a velcro back. I was confused about the sizing at first, but with the velcro back the xs-XL works great! My medela pumping bra's zipper is faulty and I occasionally get stuck in the bra. So far the zipper on the Simple Wishes bra seems much better than the medela one. And if it does go bad, I won't be stuck since the back opens!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Velcro doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these after my first pregnancy and it worked great for 8+ months of pumping. Bought a new one after my second and the Velcro is completely shot after 4 months. Definitely not the same quality product as it was two years ago. I purchased a new one to replace it and went for one without Velcro. Also, the Velcro is very uncomfortable and itchy against your back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended. No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: I'm nursing my third baby. When I had my first, I bought a pumping bra from amazon that was no good. So I didn't bother with my second. Now I saw the excellent reviews on this item and decided to give it a try. I have absolutely NO regrets buying this. In fact, I wonder how I coped with my earlier babies without this. I'm actually pumping at the moment with this bra, while writing this review. It is adjustable across various sizes. In fact, it's so comfortable that many times I sleep off while pumping at night. Thankfully, my spectra pump shuts off automatically after 30 minutes. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Just buy it if you are pumping milk for your kid. Don’t think twice and just buy it. I doesn’t know how to feed my kid I tried to reach lacticians and everyone but my baby habituated for bottle she never came to me. When I bought this it saved my time and from my back pain too. Using hands I got backpain. Now iam fine. Even it express more milk comparatively. I changed 3 pumps but I used only one of these through out baby feeding. I wash it frequently but it is very good
customer_reviews.author: Swarna

customer_reviews.title: Loved so much I bought a second
customer_reviews.text: So glad I went with this style over the sports bra. I have never used the straps that come with it. With it basically being strappless I never had to fully undress to put it on. Huge time saver while pumping at work! You can just lift up your cloths, zip this thing on and go. It velcros in the back to adjust tightness. Never had a bottle slip while pumping. Best pumping purchase to date.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Golec

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. I feel like this just makes more work for me. I've used it like twice and I will probably use it more when I'm at work but right now at home I don't use it. I don't feel like I'm that big and it barely wraps around me. the velcro is definitely cheap and I feel like you could just sew it together to be a permanent piece. I was super excited to get this but don't even use it unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Great pump bra, just not for all day wear
customer_reviews.text: I’m a nurse and I was hoping to be able to wear this at work instead of a regular bra so I didn’t have to put it on/take it off multiple times in a shift... found out it would make me super sweaty though if I wore it all day, and not the best support for all day wear. Not a big deal though - zipper in front makes it easy to get on and off quickly. Does its job well for pumping, and easily adjustable, so I’m happy. Also have it in black so I can wash between shifts and have another ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Harris

customer_reviews.title: Breast Cups Too Close Together
customer_reviews.text: The breast cups are too close together, so pumps cannot be placed appropriately. I usually wear size small and am bra size 32C. Unless you wear extra-small, the breast cups will most likely be too close together for you. The package says that a piece can be attached to widen the gap between breast cups, but this piece needs to be purchased separately.
customer_reviews.author: yjk

customer_reviews.title: Great pumping bra!
customer_reviews.text: The openings for the pumps have two layers of stretchy material which hold the flanges in place very well. The velcro back allows for a wide range of size adjustment. My bust is 48" and I have it extended as big as it goes, it's snug enough for a secure hold and probably couldn't fit too much larger... maybe a couple of inches, but definitely can go a lot smaller! I really like the adjustable/ removable straps as well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saved my sanity when i went back to work!
customer_reviews.text: This saved my life when i had to go back to work. Saves a ton of time to be able to pump both sides at once. And i think it actually helps you get more milk out when both are going together. Not sure how, but that seemed to be the case for me. I had to put it pretty tight in order to keep the flanges tight enough, so it wasn't as comfortable as a regular bra. But i only wore it while pumping, and then switched back to my other bra to finish work. Just kept this in my pump bag and put it on for pumping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great necessity for breast pumping moms!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, is comfortable, and love that there are many adjustments you can make to the bra so it fits prefect for your body. There is Velcro at the back, you can close the bra from the front, shoulder straps you can leave on or remove, and an extra zipper expander included if you need more space between the front closure. Its a nice texture and holds the pumping equipment so you can be hands free.
customer_reviews.author: BeTheSunshine

customer_reviews.title: Works with Specta and Medela.
customer_reviews.text: It works with my spectra and medela. I dont use the straps, but wear it strapless. My office is in my car so I have to pump on the road and I wouldn't be able to do it without this. My 1st pregnancy I made one, but the 2nd time around I wanted to not have to take my shirt off fully to pump. This is a good value for your $$.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Such a great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Ahhhh I never realized how much time I spent holding the pump and the bottles as I prayed my baby wouldn't wake up until I was done! With this bra, I am able to pump both sides at the same time while still getting some other stuff done. Can't really hold baby while pumping both sides, but I was able to keep pumping one side while nursing one the other side. The fit is so comfortable and easy to adjust! I never even used the straps because it fit so snugly without them. I was so impressed with this bra! Highly recommend for anyone who plans to pump, even for a couple weeks - it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M. Erb

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for pumping!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is amazing for pumping! Actually, this is the second one I’ve bought - I wanted to be able to leave one at work. It allows me to be hands free while pumping, which honestly is such a game changer when you pump several times a day! Also, it holds the flanges very close, so I actually get more milk when using the bra than when I was just holding the flanges to my chest. I think the pressure from it being a little tighter gets more milk.
customer_reviews.author: ARuss

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed but misaligned
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, but just doesn’t work for me personally. The flanges end up misaligned—too narrow as the product ships, and too wide with the 1-inch extender. Also, the strapless design isn’t my favorite, and the straps don’t seem to hold it in place quite right. Also, with shipping the 1-inch extender ended up being expensive. Will live at the bottom of my office desk as a backup if my preferred pumping bras aren’t available. Not the worst, but enough little annoyances that I’m “meh” about the whole experience. Three stars.
customer_reviews.author: JLJ

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: This is the only pumping bra I’ve ever used so I can’t compare to other bras. But I do think it’s a good price compared to others. It works well, hold the bottles up just fine and limits what others are able to see so I don’t feel exposed. It’s very comfortable, and the Velcro allows for it to be looses or tightened accordingly. I’ve already bought multiple of these.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanita Azevedo

customer_reviews.title: The best pump bra out there!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is amazing! I purchased a Medela one prior to buying this one, and wow, what a difference! I love that it is adjustable and it’s so user friendly. I think it’s also neat how you can use this with straps or go strapless. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Makes pumping way easier!
customer_reviews.text: This pumping bra is a lifesaver! I'm a first time mom of a 2 1/2 week old and I'm still figuring out the whole baby feeding thing. Pumping was annoying because I had to hold the flanges and couldn't do anything else. With this bra, pumping has become easy and effortless!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now, you will not regret it!!!’
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these bras. I have multiple, and they have lasted through 3 babies (pumped at work, so they got lots of use!) I have a large chest, and these supported that while keeping flanges tight. I love that it is very customizable: the back and front panel width can be changed (you have to buy different sized extension panel if needed) and straps can be removed too. Can’t say enough about this bra, I’d never go back to the ones with just a hole cut out.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out for me
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this bra would work. When you pump every few hours, you really feel like you can be doing something productive meanwhile! And I was hoping to get some work done on the computer. Well that didn't work! I still had to hold the pumps since they just wouldn't stay close enough to the breasts to actually get the milk out. I'm returning the bra. I guess I'll just have to do work during my "not-pumping" time
customer_reviews.author: Vasili Vassiliev

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: This thing was worth every penny. I personally wouldn’t wear it as a regular bra, but for hands free it has saved me from wanting to quit pumping. I just unclip my nursing bra and slap this over. Sitting there holding the pumps was maddening. Keeps the pumps perfectly in place so I can do other things.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Holds the Pump in Place, But Thin
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This bra fits well and is comfortable. I like that it has straps unlike other pumping bras that are strapless. It is easy to get flanges in and have them stay put. I can keep my hands free when I’m pumping which means the bra is serving its purpose. Cons: The bra is on the thin side. I do not recommend wearing it under clothes if you are someone who leaks like me and doesn’t want to wear breast pads. Thicker pumping bras typically absorb any leaking I have and I don’t have to stick breast pads in.
customer_reviews.author: Give Me the Goods

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality fabric
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased this bra. The first time was in 2016 with my son and now a new one with my daughter. The quality this time is terrible. The fabric is so thin the bra is getting little holes where I have to stretch to get the funnels in and out. Also, the center panel was included last time and is not with this purchase and you have to have it for the bra to fit right. It's a great bra... but they have sacrificed their quality over the years.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered based on the size in back of package and it’s not accurate. I’m a 36D and clearly put me in the XS-L sizing. Got it in and I could barely get it to Velcro around my chest, not even close to fitting. The quality feels good and I think I’ll like it once I get a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: TekBrandy

customer_reviews.title: Sheds Fibers First Few Wears
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and seems durable, but sheds black fibers on the pump parts and breasts so it seems like it would ruin the milk supply being pumped. It would be great if it didn't shed so much even after being washed. *Update: stops shedding after a few wears. I suggest wearing it a bit before using it to pump. If you're not in the middle of the sizing, then size up or down as needed.
customer_reviews.author: CosmicConiferous

customer_reviews.title: IT FITS!! I love it so much!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this actually fits me!! It’s is SO HARD for me to ever find anything bra related that actually works for my size (which is a 42H). This fits perfectly with plenty of room to adjust if needed! I am SO HAPPY to have found this! I didn’t have a pumping bra with my first and it made pumping a real chore! I’m excited to have my hands free this time around! It’s also great quality and soft material. I couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles and Belly Laughs

customer_reviews.title: Still an amazing bra for the job it was designed for and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day. I couldn't pump without it. I just wish it wasn't strapless so I could wear it during the day/night. AND I wish that the holes made it possible to wear during the day so I didn't have to keep taking it off and putting it on EVERY TIME I pump. Still an amazing bra for the job it was designed for and keeps the pumps in place the whole session. Do not put this product in the dryer because it will fall apart. The velcro that holds the adjustment piece in the back is already coming off and it's only been one wash.
customer_reviews.author: Dam Fam

customer_reviews.title: Love the adjustability!
customer_reviews.text: Great hands free nursing bra! I use this every night when I’m pumping. Works well, soft and durable. I love that you can adjust the sizing. My chest was much bigger right after birth as opposed to months later so I’ve been able to adjust the size to fit every step of the way. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: aduh

customer_reviews.title: Love this bra!
customer_reviews.text: Best pump bra! This is my second kiddo to pump with and I'm buying this bra again! I used the last one for 21 months while pumping and this one seems to be just as amazing. Thrilled, hoping it lasts me 2 years also. Works with spectra parts and Medela parts, great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JonesFamily1

customer_reviews.title: Great bra but didn’t get the straps advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this pumping bra it was such a pain having to hold the flanges on especially since I’m exclusively pumping. The only thing that’s an issue is the straps or should I say strap. It only came with one strap and it comes loose so easily that it’s kind of pointless to use. On my right side The bra comes down a little sometimes and makes it so the flange pinches the underside of my breast. It would be nice to have straps that would hold it up better so that didn’t happen.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Velcro doesn't work after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product replaced once, and then ordered a second one myself. I really like the concept of it, but the Velcro wears away very quickly. I have been using my current bra for 1 month, and it pops open in the middle of pumping. I have tried cleaning the Velcro, changing the placement, etc. Disappointed that this product doesn't last for more than one month.
customer_reviews.author: sunglasswearer

customer_reviews.title: Same as the Lansinoh Simple Wishes Pumping Bra
customer_reviews.text: At first I was worried that this product was different than the Lansinoh Simple Wishes pumping bra. After receiving and using this one, I can’t tell that there is a different other than it’s not branded as Lansinoh. It is exactly the same as my Lansinoh one except that one is pink and this is black. I love the softness, adjustability, and the ability to fit the entire flange through the opening as opposed to the Medela pumping bra.
customer_reviews.author: Af808

customer_reviews.title: The best postnatal purchase I have made
customer_reviews.text: This helps me save A LOT OF TIME that I could have wasted holding the flanges. I love that the size is adjustable so it will always fit me no matter what. I tried using the Medela one before this, but it was way too tight! I suspect it caused some clogs too. Not this though! You can adjust to your comfort using the velcro strap at the back. Highly recommend for new mums.
customer_reviews.author: Rue W.

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: This pumping bra changing everything for me. My son did not take well to breastfeeding, but I had the supply and wanted him to be breastfed. I turned to exclusively pumping. It was mentally draining and not easy. When I bought this pumping bra that changed everything. I could now pump hands free so I could tend to my little man, cook, read, have a little freedom back. Because of this he was able to have only breast milk for his whole first year. I have bought this for two close friends who plan to pump while working and suggested it to many others. It was truly the reason I was able to stick with pumping. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: A little too snug, but gets the job done. I usually wear a 2x/3x and this fit fine. Could have used a little more wiggle room but definitely held the girls up when pumping. The straps were very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Amayzing

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely my favorite pumping bra! I have two of them and I have purchased a third for a baby shower gift. I don't know what I would do without them!!! I've had people walk in on me while I was pumping and they don't even realize what's going on because I am covered with this bra. I can also get my work done on the computer while pumping. I'm actually wearing this while typing now :) I LOVE this pumping bra. If you're thinking about getting it, trust me, it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Shingleton

customer_reviews.title: must have item for pumping moms
customer_reviews.text: this bra makes pumping so much easier!! sure I can hold the bottles myself but I so often myself relaxing and not paying attention before I realize the shell had slipped off my breast and it's not pumping any milk out. this bra takes care of that and makes pumping hands free so I can multi task. I can do laundry during pumping or just relax and read a book. I imagine you could also work while pumping as well.
customer_reviews.author: Randy & Katie

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable due to sizing
customer_reviews.text: According to the size chart this should have fit me, but I had to adjust it until the velcro was just barely reaching, leaving exposed velcro scratching my back/clinging to clothes. Also fit very oddly across the breasts and extension pieces weren’t available. It got the job done, but the discomfort made me apprehensive about pumping.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Fiedler

customer_reviews.title: So simple! Works great!
customer_reviews.text: So simple to use. Stays put too. Comes with straps if needed. I am a 40B/C and I bought the S-XL. I am very broad but small chested. It has an adjustable strap in the back to make it smaller or larger. I use the Spectra S2 pump and they fit great. Love love love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

product_meta.title: XS/Large Hands Free Breast Pumping Bra | DLITE by Simple Wishes (by Moms for Moms) | Adjustable, Padded, Modest Cover and Tight Seal, Comfortable, Supportive, All Day Wear | Soft Pink | Single Bra
product_meta.description:
Size:XS/Large - Soft Pink| Color:Soft PinkSimple Wishes D*LITE Hands Free Breastpump Bra 

This is the same high-quality bra as the Simple Wishes Signature Bra, the only difference is this option doesn't include the 1" Center Panel. The Center Panels are used by women who need to create a little extra space between their breasts to get proper alignment of the breast pump bottles with their breasts. If that's not you, then you've found the right choice!

The D*LITE Bra allows you to handle other tasks while pumping, helping keep you on top of your to-do list, or allowing you to get that few extra minutes of sleep. Remove the hassle and time constraint of pumping, with this hands-free pumping bra.

The D*LITE Hands Free Breastpump Bra offers exceptional hands-free support of breastpump bottles and adjustability in size as a nursing mother's shape changes. Adjusting the size of the bra is a breeze by tightening or loosening the secure Velcro back panel. Included with this bra are straps to allow for Racerback, Standard, or a Strapless fit, ensuring you get exactly what you need!
feature_bullets: A PERFECT FIT! As a breastfeeding mother's shape changes, this bra can be adjusted up to 10" around the ribcage by resetting the secure Velcro back panel. This guarantees as much of a perfect fit for the 1,000th pumping session as it did for the 1st!
TURN ANY BREAST PUMP INTO A HANDS FREE PUMP! The DLite Bra is the same as our Signature Bra, simply without the optional 1" center panel
MODEST COVER AND TIGHT SEAL! Four overlapping layers of fabric secure and maintain a tight seal for bottles as well as providing a modest, discreet cover for the breasts.

SUPPORTIVE AND EASY TO USE! Zips on easily with or without removing nursing bra and shirt. Elastic reinforcement has been built into the top of the Bra for a secure fit, ensuring no slipping. May be worn strapless or with included straps for extra support.
Intended for use when pumping. Not meant for all day wear.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars4,086 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
